name: Iso8601_time
documentation:
Represents an ISO 8601 time, including partial and extended forms. Value may be:

* `hh:mm:ss[(,|.)sss][Z|±hh[:mm]]` (extended, preferred) or
* `hhmmss[(,|.)sss][Z|±hh[mm]]` (compact)
* or a partial invariant.

See `_valid_iso8601_time()_` for validity.

NOTE: A small deviation to the ISO 8601:2004 standard in this class is that the time `24:00:00` is not allowed, for consistency with `Iso8601_date_time`.

hour.name: hour
hour.documentation: Extract the hour part of the date/time as an Integer.

minute.name: minute
minute.documentation: Extract the minute part of the time as an Integer, or return 0 if not present.

second.name: second
second.documentation: Extract the integral seconds part of the time (i.e. prior to any decimal sign) as an Integer, or return 0 if not present.

fractional_second.name: fractional_second
fractional_second.documentation: Extract the fractional seconds part of the time (i.e. following to any decimal sign) as a Real, or return 0.0 if not present.

minute_unknown.name: minute_unknown
minute_unknown.documentation: Indicates whether minute is unknown. If so, the time is of the form “hh”.

second_unknown.name: second_unknown
second_unknown.documentation: Indicates whether second is unknown. If so and month is known, the time is of the form `"hh:mm"` or `"hhmm"`.

is_decimal_sign_comma.name: is_decimal_sign_comma
is_decimal_sign_comma.documentation: True if this time has a decimal part indicated by `','` (comma) rather than `'.'` (period).

is_partial.name: is_partial
is_partial.documentation: True if this time is partial, i.e. if seconds or more is missing.

is_extended.name: is_extended
is_extended.documentation: True if this time uses `'-'`, `':'` separators.

has_fractional_second.name: has_fractional_second
has_fractional_second.documentation: True if the `_fractional_second_` part is significant (i.e. even if = 0.0).

as_string.name: as_string
as_string.documentation: Return string value in extended format.

add.name: add
add.documentation: Arithmetic addition of a duration to a time.

subtract.name: subtract
subtract.documentation: Arithmetic subtraction of a duration from a time.
